register.reg_long_name: System Performance Monitors Event Count Register

purpose_text.para: Event counter <n> in System PMU <s>, where n is 0 to 63.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: The number of implemented bits for SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. Unimplemented bits are RES0.

access_permission_text.para: To access SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 for System PMU <s>, set SPMSELR_EL0.SYSPMUSEL to s and SPMSELR_EL0.BANK to n[5:4].
SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 reads-as-zero and ignores writes if any of the following are true:

listitem.content: Event counter <n> is not implemented by System PMU <s>.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
